questionText: What is not a software process activity from the followings?

answerOptions: To know who will use the system

questionText: What is not a strength of waterfall model?
answerOptions: Defects are detected and fixed early
correctAnswer: Defects are detected and fixed early

questionText: Which model is the evolution of waterfall model?

Select requirements elicitation techniques?
What is the disadvantage of the spiral model?
answerOptions: Does not work well for smaller projects
The high amount of risk analysis
Additional functionality can be added later
correctAnswer: Does not work well for smaller projects

questionText: In Software Engineering the method of CMM model is used to _____ ?
In which model the project risk factor is considered?
What is the most important use of the incremental model?
answerOptions: Customers can respond to each increment
To use it when we need to get a product to the market early
Easier to test and debug and use it when we need to get a product to the market early
correctAnswer: Easier to test and debug and use it when we need to get a product to the market early

questionText: The incremental model is the combination of which models?
answerOptions: Build and FIX Model and waterfall model
